content.text: The Jewish leaders thought that Jesus dishonoured their rules by healing people on the Sabbath day. They also thought that he dishonoured God by calling God his Father. They wanted to kill him for doing these things.

Jesus explained to the religious leaders that he did his work to please God. He wanted them to understand his relationship with his Father. Jesus and his Father love each other and depend on one another. Jesus was doing on earth the work he saw his Father doing. This work was to save God’s world.

Some people refuse to believe that Jesus comes from God. They refuse to receive the life that God wants to give them. Jesus will give life that can’t be destroyed to everyone who believes in him. They will be saved from death and
. They will enjoy life for ever with God.
The religious leaders thought that they honoured God by obeying all the rules they made. But to really honour God they needed to honour Jesus.
